Third Year Philosophy

Day I II III IV V
Monday Spirituality English English Hist. of W. Contem. Phil Gandhian Phil
Tuesday English Phil. of Religion English Hist. of W. Contem. Phil Gandhian Phil

Friday Dissertation Metaphysics Metaphysics Metaphysics Music/Dissertation
